sent.orig: The program provides job training for people who otherwise could not adapt attend college.
sent.trans: 这项计划为那些不能上大学的人提供工作培训。

sent.orig: He worked hard; otherwise he would have failed.
sent.trans: 他努力读书镲，否则他当时一定会不及格。

sent.orig: The exams will be unless otherwise indicated.
sent.trans: 如无明确指示，测验将闭卷进行。

sent.orig: Otherwise, the calculating method for the main parameters of an electro-hydraulic impulse crusher is briefly introduced.
sent.trans: 此外，对电液压咏冲破碎装置主要参数的计算方法也作了简要介绍。

sent.orig: Otherwise, the written decision shall be sent to the employee's home via overnight or certified mail.
sent.trans: 不然的话，这份书面决定应以快递或挂号邮件送达该员工的家。
